game.name: Doomclock
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Doomclock is a roguelite, top-down arena shooter with deckbuilding elements. Bathe in blood of the damned, unlock new cards, and craft your deck of heavenly and hellish powers to survive the apocalypse. Be quick or be dead — there’s no time to rest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Doomclock is a roguelite, top-down arena shooter with deckbuilding elements. Bathe in blood of the damned, unlock new cards, and craft your deck of heavenly and hellish powers to survive the apocalypse. Be quick or be dead — there’s no time to rest.
